summary: REQ-46 asks for a fresh rebuild/deploy with no functional or user-facing changes. The diff adds a rebuild-trigger file and a build-trigger comment (which can force a new artifact), but it does not provide evidence of an actual deployment/live promotion. The diff also shows multiple modified source/metadata files beyond a minimal rebuild trigger, which appear unrelated to a deployment-only request.

missing_requirements.requirement: The newly built version is deployed successfully and is accessible to testers/users via the platformâ€™s deployment URL (and promoted to live/production if applicable).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows repository file changes; there is no evidence of a completed deployment, a deployment URL, or draft-to-live promotion steps/artifacts.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend application code despite the request being deployment-only with no application functionality changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-46 explicitly constrains changes to a rebuild/deploy action only; backend/main.mo is modified, which suggests implementation-level changes beyond a rebuild trigger (exact functional impact cannot be verified from truncated diff).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project documentation/metadata describing numerous product features (not required for a rebuild/deploy-only request).
hallucinated_features.reason: Changing feature summaries/state tracking is not part of triggering a rebuild and deployment; it adds scope beyond REQ-46.
